title: SCP-5074
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]
[!--
**Item Number**[[footnote]]SCP-5074 specifically requested no copy-pasted symbols, to the great convenience of the author of this article.[[/footnote]]**:** SCP-5074
 
**Object Class:** sdlkfjljkrjr r r r rrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr[[footnote]]Esoteric object class graciously provided by SCP-5074 itself. Class denotes an object that is //(aggressive hooting)// and //(picking mites out of navel)//.[[/footnote]]
 
**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-5074 is to be kept within Site-19's most lavish and luxurious simian containment unit, and is to be provided with 10 bananas, 17 coconuts, and 257 termites daily by a detail of highly trained and attractive Wilson's Wildlife Solutions personnel. The entity is also to be provided with a camera, a typewriter, writing utensils, and paper, with which it is to record its great deeds and exploits.
 
**Description:** SCP-5074 is an adult male chimpanzee //(Pan troglodytes)//[[footnote]]As the author has memorized the scientific name of chimpanzees, no copy-pasting was necessary[[/footnote]] notable for its anomalously enhanced physical strength, an intelligence surpassing that of most college professors, scientists, and mathematicians, and strikingly handsome facial features. 
 
SCP-5074 uses its extraordinary abilities quite liberally, and is known to record its adventures using its camera and aided by the photomanipulation software on its computer. The following is a gallery of such instances.
 
[[div class="blockquote"]]
@@ @@
[[div class="scp-image-block block-center" style="width:100%;"]]
